revised_title: Royal Society Members and Elections in 1973
tldr: This article from the Royal Society's Notes and Records highlights obituaries of notable members, including William Sawney Bisat, Francis Albert Eley Crew, and Sidney Barrington Gates. It also announces the election of Lord Hailsham of St Marylebone and the recognition of foreign members such as John Bardeen, Karl Ziegler, and Arthur Charles Neish for their significant contributions to science.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Science History
